p: Other potential scalable approaches have been described, such as enzymatic [ 107– 114], alkaline [ 115– 120] and based on different types of aqueous media (e.g., cyclodextrins, montmorillonite K-10/LiOH, green liquor) [ 121– 130]; ionic liquids [ 131– 135], deep eutectic solvents [ 136– 138], constituting alternative methods for the recovery of high added-value compounds from agro-industrial waste aiming at obtaining the best analytical, economical and socio-environmental compromise [ 139– 142].
